note: This is a preliminary version of the pySigma plugin directory. It will be replaced soon with a version 1. Don't use this for productive purposes!

splunk.description: Splunk backend for conversion into SPL and tstats data model queries as plain queries and savedsearches.conf

insightidr.description: Rapid7 InsightIDR backend that generates LEQL queries.

qradar.description: IBM QRadar backend for conversion into AQL and extension packages.

elasticsearch.description: Elasticsearch backend converting into Lucene queries, plain, embedded into DSL or as Kibana NDJSON.

opensearch.description: Opensearch backend converting into Lucene queries and Opensearch alerting rules.

ala.description: Azure Log Analytics backend with Windows log support maintained by SOC Prime.

azure.description: Azure Log Analytics backend with Windows log support maintained by @sifex.

stix.description: STIX backend converting into plain STIX queries. Contains mappings for STIX 2.0 and STIX Shifter taxonomies.

sysmon.description: Mapping from generic log sources to Sysmon events.

crowdstrike.description: Mapping from generic log sources to CrowdStrike events from raw endpoint logs (FDR, Investigate).

ossem.description: Mapping from OSSEM to Sigma taxonomy.
